story.text: Jan 3 Professional staffing firm On Assignment Inc. ASGN.O named James Brill as chief financial officer and senior vice president, finance, effective Jan. 1. Brill replaces Michael Holtzman, who resigned for medical reasons effective Dec. 8, 2006, the company said in a statement. (Reporting by Bijoy Koyitty in Bangalore)
story.title: on assignment names new cfo
